text: Fallen Stars and Rising Scars is the first album by progressive metal band Wastefall. ==Track listing== # Killing of Wolves (04:52) # Like Father Like None (06:06) # For What is to be Lost (01:33) # Fall of Eva (05:33) # Annabel Lee (06:55) # Confession (02:15) # Subroutine (04:32) # April's Ruin (05:42) # That was all About (07:14) # One with the Fall (06:44) ==External links== *Album info on Metal Storm Category:Wastefall albums Category:2003 albums
title: Fallen Stars and Rising Scars
